name: Minesweeper & Break the Code
description:
Two classic logic games of all times in one app: Minesweeper & Break the Code!
Both very easy to play, highly addictive, and with several difficulty options!

Features:
- Colorful graphics.
- Great Music and SFX.
- Close any time and resume later.
Minesweeper:
- 6 Board sizes.
- Choose the density of mines.
- Enable lives or play classic single life.
Break the Code:
- Choose the amount of ball colors.
- Choose how many ball places.
- Select either to allow repeat colors or not.

More info and games at: www.boviosoft.com
